amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for Procurement, Defense-Wide by $5 million and increases funds for breast cancer research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Procurement, Defense-Wide by $5,000,000 and to increase funds for the Defense Health Program by the same amount.

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
